effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.flatulence.d: Sneak to induce flatulence and and gain elevation.
effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.tundra_strid: Increased movement speed on snow, ice, and powder snow. Prevents sinking into powder snow.
effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.warmth.descr: Slowly regenerate health when near heat sources such as stoves, campfires, lava etc.
effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.satiated_shi: Hunger value acts as extra health; damage is absorbed by hunger value first.
effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.mustard.desc: Creepers nearby will flee from you.
effect.kaleidoscope_cookery.preservation: Eating rotten flesh, raw chicken, poisonous potatoes, pufferfish, or spider eyes will not cause debuffs.
item.kaleidoscope_cookery.scramble_egg_w: Scramble Egg with Tomatoes on Rice
item.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_fried_por: Stir-fried Pork with Peppers on Rice
item.kaleidoscope_cookery.sweet_and_sour: Sweet and Sour Pork on Rice
item.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_flavored_: Fish Flavored Shredded Pork on Rice
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stove: Heat source for cookware lit with flint and steel.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot: Place on heat source, add oil, add ingredients, stir-fry, serve.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.fail: Cooking will fail if you use the wrong ingredients or take too long.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stockpot: Place on heat source, add broth base and ingredients in order, cover and cook.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stockpot.fa: Opening lid pauses cooking. Wrong steps result in suspicious stew.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stockpot_li: Used on stockpots; also usable as a shield.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil: Can be obtained by killing pigs/piglins/hoglins with kitchen knife.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.chopping_bo: Use with kitchen knife to cut meat.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.enamel_basi: Stores oil. Right-click with kitchen shovel to apply oil to it.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.shawarma_sp: Cooks food when powered by redstone. Turn off before removing food!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.millstone: Certain animals placed above the millstone will be harnessed to drive it.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.kitchen_kni: Used to kill pigs/piglins/hoglins to get oil.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.crop_seed: Obtained by breaking grass while wearing straw hat.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.straw_hat: When worn, breaking grass drops seeds from this mod.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.caterpillar: Chance to drop when harvesting lettuce.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.kitchen_sho: Cooking tool; also usable as a shovel.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fruit_baske: Stores 8 stacks of items like a shulker box.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.scarecrow: Used to protect surrounding farmland. Right-click to equip skulls/lanterns/tools.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.recipe_item: Right-click a wok or a stockpot to record ingredients for one-click cooking later.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.steamer: Stack up to 8 layers for steaming. Sneak right-click to start the steaming process.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.transmutati: Stores food and performs magical transmutation, right-click to eat.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.cold_cut_ha: Savory, rich, and chewy thick-cut ham slices.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_bee: Soft potatoes, tender beef, the soul of a Northeastern stew.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.spicy_chick: Spicy and fragrant, crispy outside and tender inside, the soul of Sichuan cuisine.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.delicious_e: Each grain distinct, filled with egg and rice aroma, the ultimate fried rice.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.nether_styl: Crimson mysterious fungus with raw fish, the wild flavor of The Nether.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.donkey_soup: Rich and mellow soup made of meat as rare as the dragons of the heavens.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.sweet_and_s: Ender pearls coated in sweet and sour sauce, the last meal before teleportation.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.beef_noodle: Chewy noodles with beef, satisfaction overload in one bowl.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.yakitori.ma: Charcoal aroma lingering, juicy chicken, soul of the izakaya.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_flavor: No fish, yet full of fish aroma, the magic of Sichuan cuisine.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.suspicious_: What is this... What dish are you making...!?
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.meat_pie.ma: Crispy crust, full of meat filling, happiness in every bite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.shengjian_m: Crispy bottom, soft top, soul of the Shanghai breakfast.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.dumpling.ma: Thinly-rolled skin, plump filling, bursting with juice, the taste of home.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_bee: Rich and fragrant sauce, delicate and tender meat.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.chicken_and: Chicken stewed with mushrooms, incredibly fragrant.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.samsa.maxim: Hey young man! Try some of this authentic flavored samsa!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.cold_style_: Snowball-chilled sashimi. Will make you feel the cold.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.mantou.maxi: The simplest steamed bun, also the staple food that warms the most hearts.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.chorus_frie: Chorus fruit meets fried egg, might cause teleportation.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.tundra_styl: Flower-decorated sashimi with a tundra freshness.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fondant_spi: Fear wrapped in sugar coating, a sweet and dark cuisine.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.egg_fried_r: Golden fried rice. Simple, yet eternally classic.
Chewy Hui noodles in a rich broth. Flavors of the Central Plains.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.seafood_mis: Savory seafood flavors, light, wholesome, a stomach-warming choice.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.crystal_lam: Lamb chops wrapped in amethyst luster, a crystal clear deliciousness.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_fis: Braised fish over rice, fresh and fragrant to the soul.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_fried_: Crispy peppers, tender pork slices, the soul of home cooking.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.slime_ball_: Eat a bowl of slime rice, wish you stick together tonight!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fearsome_th: One spoon of this thick soup brings the world to a droop.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pufferfish_: Append a legend to your biography by drinking this soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.golden_sala: Shimmering golden luxurious salad, an extravagant toss.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.baozi.maxim: Steaming hot buns, full of happiness in every bite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.scramble_eg: A spoonful of tomato egg over rice, happiness overload.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.borscht.max: Sweet and sour, appetite opening, skyborne ecstasy.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_fried_: Spicy fragrant chili, chewy beef offal, perfect drinking companion.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.sweet_and_s: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, children's favorite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_fried_: Tender pork shreds, crunchy fragrant peppers, sauce-wrapped rice satisfaction in one bite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.donkey_burg: The fragrance lingers with every bite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_fried_: So spicy that you need two more bowls of plain rice to balance it out.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_flavor: Fish-flavored sauce wrapped around rice. You won't stop after just one bowl.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.cooked_rice: Aroma fills the room; deliciousness fills the bowl.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.desert_styl: Wild cactus and raw fish. A taste of the wasteland.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.scramble_eg: Sweet and sour tomatoes paired with tender scrambled eggs. The national dish of China.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.udon_noodle: Bouncy and tender udon noodles, rich and delicious broth.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.dongpo_pork: "Without meat, one becomes thin. Without bamboo, one becomes vulgar."
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.wild_mushro: A heartwarming story from the forest.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.suspicious_: A bowl of mysterious stir-fry on rice. What happens if you eat it?
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.beef_meatba: Healing, warm, life-changing beef meatball soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_bee: Tender and succulent beef with rich and fragrant broth - the soul mate of rice lovers.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_fis: Tender fish meat, rich sauce, makes you want to gnaw the fish bones clean.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.frost_lamb_: Frosty blue lamb chops, makes your teeth chatter.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.spicy_chick: Spicy, soul departing, but you'll still want another serving.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.sweet_and_s: Sweet and sour pork, great on rice. Sure to improve your mood.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stargazy_pi: Breaking through the crust, gazing at the sky, as if they're pondering something...
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.tomato_beef: Tangy tomato flavor, dominant beef brisket taste, an appetitzing soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.blaze_lamb_: Lamp chops empowered with blaze rods. Hot enough for your soul to depart.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fondant_pie: Pumpkin pie wrapped in sweet honey, an artwork of the dessert world.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.end_style_s: Embellished with flavors of The End, this dish delivers a novel taste that excites the palate.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.country_sty: Simple, plain, yet nutritious and wholesome.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pan_seared_: Bone marrow richness garnished with sweet berries. The knight's source of strength.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.candied_pot: Long sugar threads, crispy exterior, soft interior, full of creamy potato flavor.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.dough_drop_: A common homestyle soup in northern China, originating from an ancient story about the respect and care from a daughter to her parents.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stuffed_tig: Green peppers fried to a tiger-skin pattern, wrapped with savory and juicy meat filling.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.spicy_rabbi: Spicy, numbing, and addictive. Rabbits are indeed delicious!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.four_joy_me: Four big round meatballs soaked in a rich, clear and light broth.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.numbing_spi: Chicken torn into shreds, mixed with numbing and spicy sauce, a fresh and refreshing traditional Xinjiang dish.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fried_sprin: Fried with low heat, golden, crispy and tender. Said to have evolved from the "Spring Pancakes" of the Eastern Jin Dynasty.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.spicy_blood: Spicy spicy spicy spicy spicy spicy spicy spicy spicy!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fruit_platt: Exquisitely cut fruit platter, a vitamin C bomb and a party!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.brown_mushr: A pot of simmered fresh mushrooms. Rich, mellow, full of warmth.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.red_mushroo: A pot of simmered fresh mushrooms. Rich, mellow, full of warmth.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.warped_fung: Tongue rolling through a lava sea, a warmth imprinted on a famished soul.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.crimson_fun: Tongue rolling through a lava sea, a warmth imprinted on a famished soul.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.buddha_jump: A famous Fujian specialty alternatively known as "fotiaoqiang". A rich, glossy, silky brown stew filled to the brim with meaty aroma and flavors without being greasy.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_por: Fall-off-the-bone tender pork with a rich sauce.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil_splashe: Hot oil is splashed on to let the aromas bursts forth while keeping the fish fresh and tender. Packed with numbing spiciness.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.sickle: Right click to harvest crops and remove weeds.
tip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.need_kitche: Sneak and right click with kitchen shovel to serve!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.root.d: Add a touch of fantasy to the world!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.iron_k: Even a Kung Fu Master Would Fear the Kitchen Knife
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.nether: Only the Best Steel for the Blade
Upgrade your kitchen knife with netherite.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil.de: Use kitchen knife to kill pigs, piglins, or hoglins to get oil.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.danger: Use kitchen knife to kill piglin brutes.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.choppi: Use kitchen knife on chopping board to prepare new ingredients.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.flower: Craft the flowery straw hat. It may be ordinary, but still very pretty.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.tomato: Don't forget to wear a straw hat when mowing grass. You might discover some new things...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.iron_h: Use a hoe to make farmland under water to create paddy fields for rice.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.rice_p: The harvest season make you especially homesick...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_r: Accelerate rice growth by raising fish in rice fields!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.caterp: These chubby guys are always found in the fields.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.feed_c: Feed a caterpillar to a baby chicken.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.farmer: Wear the complete farmer set to greatly increase movement speed in water.
Light a stove and start cooking delicious food.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.de: Craft a wok and place it above a heat source like stoves and campfires.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.add_oi: Start cooking by adding oil to a wok! Use an oil can on the wok, or use a kitchen shovel to scoop some from a grease crock.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_f: After adding ingredients, use kitchen shovel to stir-fry continuously. When ingredients are cooked, use bowl to serve!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.burn_h: Woks punish you for removing wrong ingredients!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.stockp: Craft a stockpot and place it above heat sources like stoves or campfires.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.add_br: Making different flavored soups requires adding different broths first!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.make_s: After adding ingredients to the pot, cover with lid to make soup. When soup is ready, lift the lid and use bowl to serve!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.burn_h: Stockpots with lava broth punish you for removing wrong ingredients!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.nitrog: Ascend 100 blocks using the effect of flatulence.
Ascend 300 blocks using the effect of flatulence.
Ascend 1000 blocks using the effect of flatulence.
Ascend 3000 blocks using the effect of flatulence.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.scarec: Use scarecrow to protect surrounding farmland.
Replace the scarecrow's head with a skull.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.transm: Eat from the Transmutation Lunch Bag.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.millst: Harness a donkey to a millstone.
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil_po: Place an oil can under a millstone.
La La La La La La Noodles
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.steame: Place the steamer on a heat source to steam food.
"Meat buns thrown at a dog do not return."
Sneak and throw a baozi at a wolf to heal it.
